      • DBSearchIngredient

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> DBSearchIngredient(java.lang.String ingredient)
        This function is going to search a ingredient of the food in the database It search for the given food name and get the average of all those data found
        Parameters:
        ingredient - An ingredient in a food in order to search the corresponding food in the database
        Returns:
        An arraylist with all the information(average) of that food

      • DBexist

        public static boolean DBexist(java.lang.String name)
        This function is going to check whether a food name can be found in the database
        Parameters:
        name - The food name to search in the database
        Returns:
        result Return a boolean value to tell whether the food is exist in the database. If exist, return true, else false

      • DBdeleteMenu

        public static boolean DBdeleteMenu(java.lang.String id)
        This function is going to delete all the rows in menu table of the given user id
        Parameters:
        id - The user id to search and delete in the menu table
        Returns:
        result Return a boolean value whether the rows exist and been deleted from the menu table. If all these done, return true. Else, false.

      • DBInsertMenu

        public static boolean DBInsertMenu(java.lang.String id,
                                   java.lang.String name,
                                   java.lang.String p)
        This function is going to insert a row into the menu table with the user id and the food name and price
        Parameters:
        id - The user id which will be inserted in the menu table
        name - The food name which will be inserted in the menu table
        p - The food price which will be inserted in the menu table
        Returns:
        result Return a boolean value to check whether the task is completed

      • DBgetMenu

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> DBgetMenu(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> foods,
                                                              java.lang.String id)
        This function is going to search in the menu table And get a arraylist with food name
        Parameters:
        foods - An arraylist with food name inside
        id - The user id to search in the menu table
        Returns:
        foods An arraylist added some food name selected from the database

      • DBgetTip

        public static java.lang.String DBgetTip(int n)
        This function is going to get tips from database
        Parameters:
        n - An index number in order to find the corresponding tips in the tips table
        Returns:
        tips Return a String(tips)
